name: hoarse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a voice or a person) having a rough voice, often because of a sore throat or a cold: hoarse voice "I'm feeling a little better, thank you," she replied, in a hoarse voice. sound hoarse She sounded a bit hoarse.make yourself hoarse You'll make yourself hoarse if you keep shouting like that!
